vision.notes: No specific information about vision is provided in the context. As extinct ground sloths, their reliance on vision is uncertain.

olfaction.notes: No specific information about olfaction is provided in the context. As extinct animals, their olfactory capabilities are uncertain.

hearing.notes: No specific information about hearing is provided in the context. As extinct animals, their hearing capabilities are uncertain.

touch.notes: Likely present as a basic sensory modality, inferred from extant relatives. The presence of osteoderms in some genera may have affected tactile sensitivity in localized areas.
